getClientContext

public java.lang.Object getClientContext()
Description copied from interface: MDSTransResetListener
Returns the context set on listener instance. The framework does not use this and it is purely for the client code to store any information on the listener instance

Specified by:

postSuccessfulFlush

public abstract void postSuccessfulFlush(MDSTransContext mdsTrasnCon)
Description copied from interface: MDSTransResetListener
This method is invoked after a successful finalFlushChanges() call i.e. when mdsSession.flushChanges succeeds.
